translation.en: Don't you know who I am?
-[man] I demand you open this gate! -[strumming pipa rapidly]
And with scales, some grass, some clouds.
There you are. Hungry? You want a snack?
translation.zh: 找到你了 饿了吗？吃不吃点心？
-今天学到了什么？-学到什么是龙

translation.en: -Your mom forgot you. She doesn't-- -Jimmy, stop. It's rude.
translation.zh: -你妈妈忘记你了 她不…-吉米 别说了 没礼貌

translation.en: You know it's only the two of them. She's trying her best.
translation.zh: 你明知道家里只有他母子俩那个老妇人已经尽力了

translation.en: You can walk home with me.
-I'm gonna get you! -♪ See the world dancing in your eyes ♪
No, no, you first got to multiply the top by the bottom.
translation.zh: 你要用下面的数字乘以上面的数字

translation.en: -Come here, little monkey. Up! -[laughs] Bye, Din!
translation.zh: 过来 小猴子 爬上来！ 再见 阿丁！

translation.en: ♪ I can't stop this feeling When you're near ♪
-You're late! -I had to get the stuff!
translation.zh: -你迟到了-我知道 我去把风筝弄来

translation.en: All right, scales. Oh! Roller skates!

translation.zh: 预备 起飞 超强的神龙风筝！

translation.en: Let's make a promise to be best friends forever.
translation.zh: 我们来做个约定吧我们要做永远的好朋友

translation.en: upon this we will always swear.
-Come on. It's time to go. -Dad, we said--
translation.zh: -走吧 是时候离开了-爸 我们说好…

translation.en: Li Na, we've been over this already.
translation.zh: 俐娜 我们说过好多次了
可是我刚把缝针修好了

translation.en: We're off to a… a better life, and we have to leave this one behind.
translation.zh: 我们要往更好的生活前进只能放下这些日子

translation.en: Okay, uh, next up, 235 Gao Shue Street.
translation.zh: 好的 下一个 国顺路 235号
-外卖到 祝你有个美好的一天-谢谢

translation.en: Oh, Wei! Wei, Wei, Wei, Wei!
-Wei! Old buddy… -Dude, you gotta watch where you're going.
translation.zh: 阿伟 我们是老朋友了 老兄 看路啊

translation.en: -Think you could get the assignment? -You haven't been to class in two weeks.
translation.zh: 你可以帮我去领取作业吗？ 你干吗这么拼搏？你已经缺课两星期了

translation.en: I gotta earn extra cash for this thing I'm working on.
Thing? Wait a minute, does this have to do with that girl?
translation.zh: 等一下 跟那个女孩有关吗？

translation.en: Okay, it's her birthday. I'm planning something special.
translation.zh: 我认了 她的生日快到了我在为她准备特别的礼物

translation.en: So, can you just get me the assignment, please?
translation.zh: 可以麻烦你帮我领取作业吗？拜托了

translation.en: -I'll do your homework for a week. -Fine.
translation.zh: -我帮你做一个星期的作业-好吧

translation.en: -[car horns honking] -So smart and yet so stupid.
Oh. Well, uh, I'll just… [grunts] …go around.
translation.zh: 好吧 我就… 绕进来

translation.en: Did you order the dumpling soup?
And I have chosen you! For you are pure of heart.
translation.zh: 我选了你 因为你拥有一颗纯真的心

translation.en: Well, I try to be friendly.

translation.zh: 只想维持我的五星评价

translation.en: Now, will you be paying with cash or--

translation.zh: 其实 我只需要7元35分

translation.en: You dare reject the will of the gods?
translation.zh: 你竟敢拒绝神仙的好意

translation.en: You know what? This one's on me, okay? I really gotta run, so…
translation.zh: 不如这样吧？我请你吃我赶时间 所以…

translation.en: Thanks for the teapot and have a nice day.
translation.zh: 感谢你送我的茶壶祝你有个愉快的一天

translation.en: It's just not the same without hot sauce.
translation.zh: 没了辣酱 味道就不同了
你不是要赶去某个地方吗？

translation.en: How have I been here for an hour? I gotta go!
translation.zh: 我在这里待了一个小时了？我要走了！
别关门 千万别关门

translation.en: Okay, thank you for your help!
translation.zh: 好的 感谢你的关照

translation.en: -Hey. I know! -Your mom's looking for you.
translation.zh: -嗨 陈大叔-你妈妈在找你呢 我知道！

translation.en: I said, "If you don't like garlic, eat something else!"
translation.zh: 我说：“如果你不爱吃蒜去吃其他的吧

translation.en: Hey, Mom. Here's the groceries you wanted.
translation.zh: 妈妈 这是你要的东西
瞧瞧谁来了 你迟到了！

translation.en: Oh. I, uh, stayed late for study group, as usual.
translation.zh: 跟往常一样 我跟同学们温书去了

translation.en: Thanks. I'll just take this inside and have it with a side of calculus.
translation.zh: 谢了 我把吃的拿进屋里边吃边温习微积分

translation.en: Ah, look at him, all grown up and working hard.
translation.zh: 瞧瞧他 都长这么大了还是个勤奋的孩子

translation.en: Little Din with a college degree. Can you believe it?
translation.zh: 小丁丁要考到大学学位了真不敢相信 对吧？

translation.en: -I only wish my son had been so dedicated. -Such a good boy.
translation.zh: -真希望我的儿子跟你一样积极-真是个好孩子
-我要去…-孩子 真为你感到高兴

translation.en: I'm happy for you, kiddo. Your future is all set.
translation.zh: -我要去…-孩子 真为你感到高兴 你的前途一片光明

translation.en: -A steady job, a big paycheck! -A shiny new refrigerator.
translation.zh: -一份稳定的高薪工作-一台全新闪亮的冰柜

translation.en: -A nice car. -And a flat screen. Big one!
translation.zh: -一辆豪车-一台大大的平面电视

translation.en: -He's got work to do. -Din! I'll be right over.
translation.zh: -他要去做作业了-阿丁 我马上过去！

translation.en: Uh, yes, so much work to do. I better get started on that--
translation.zh: 对啊 我有很多作业要完成还是赶紧开始做吧

translation.en: The teacher said if you don't come to at least one class this semester,
translation.zh: 老师说 这个学期如果你再缺课

translation.en: Oh, hey, Ms. Din. Even if you ace the final…
translation.zh: 嗨 丁妈 即使你年终考试还是能交出…

translation.en: I knew it. You've been skipping school and lying to your mother.
translation.zh: 我就知道 你一直在逃课和对我撒谎

translation.en: What have you been doing? Lounging in some internet cafe?
translation.zh: 你最近都在做什么？泡网咖吗？

translation.en: -Can you believe it? -Such a bad boy.
Why do this? You're a good student! You could ruin your future.
translation.zh: -你听我说-为什么不乖？ 你明明是个好学生想要自毁前程吗？

translation.en: -True. There goes the college degree. -You're not helping!
translation.zh: -是啊 大学学位就这么没了-你这是在帮倒忙！

translation.en: I was just doing a little side job.
You have one job, and one job only. That is to study.
translation.zh: 你的职业只有一个 那就当个学生

translation.en: What could possibly be more important than studying?
translation.zh: 有什么比读书还来得重要？

translation.en: -This is getting juicy. -What did he say? I can't hear.
translation.zh: -越来越精彩了-他说了什么？我听不到

translation.en: -I know I'm hard on you, but I'm-- -You're right, Mom.
translation.zh: -我知道我对你很严格 但我是…-妈 你说得对

translation.en: -Uh, what are we looking for again? -A teapot!
translation.zh: -我们要找什么来着？-一个茶壶
需要 你应该帮得上忙

translation.en: -Put your hands where I can see them. -Oh…
translation.zh: 把手拿出来 我要看到你的手

translation.en: I'm afraid that's not going to happen.
-You're under arrest. -Hold on a minute, there. [grunting]
Look who decided to show up.
Starting to take me for granted, huh?
translation.zh: 开始把我当成理所当然了

translation.en: So, what do you think of the suit?
translation.zh: 你觉得这套西服好看吗？

translation.en: Good enough to get into the birthday party of the famous Li Na Wang?
translation.zh: 足不足以参加大明星俐娜的生日派对？

translation.en: Okay, Din, tomorrow's the big day.
translation.zh: 好了 阿丁 明天是大日子

translation.en: How are we gonna do this? What am I gonna say?
translation.zh: 该怎么办呢？我该说什么呢？

translation.en: Happy birthday, it's your best friend Din! No, that's too strong.
translation.zh: 俐娜 生日快乐我是你的好朋友阿丁 不行 太强势了

translation.en: Will you allow me to kiss your hand?
translation.zh: 介意我亲一下你的手吗？

translation.en: Ugh. Man, quit being a creep, Din.
translation.zh: 天啊 阿丁 别把自己变成变态

translation.en: Oh yeah, sure, I'll dance with you.
translation.zh: 好啊 没问题 我愿意陪你跳舞

translation.en: Say, you look kind of familiar.
translation.zh: 话说回来 你看起来有点眼熟

translation.en: I got you a present. You still like kites?
translation.zh: 俐娜 我给你准备了一份礼物你还喜欢风筝吧？

translation.en: What am I saying? Of course she still likes kites.
translation.zh: 我到底在说什么？她当然还喜欢风筝了
嗨 俐娜 生日快乐

translation.en: -it's been a long time and… -[fabric fraying]
-[gasps] Oh no! -[fabric rips] Oh, gosh. Um…
-Hold on, I can fix this. -[rips] Oh, come on.
translation.zh: 等等 我可以补好的 别这样嘛

translation.en: I don't know what else to do.
I can see my whole life laid out ahead of me,
translation.zh: 我已经可以预见未来的人生道路了

translation.en: and I'm trying my best, trying to make everyone proud,
translation.zh: 我已经尽力了 我已经尽力让大家为我感到骄傲

translation.en: but the whole time it feels like something is missing.
translation.zh: 我已经尽力让大家为我感到骄傲 从小到大 我总觉得少了什么

translation.en: I just wish I could keep our promise.
translation.zh: 我们能遵守以前的约定

translation.en: Wait, what? The tea is ready?
The heavens have opened, your wishes will be granted,
translation.zh: 天界大门敞开 你将实现所有愿望

translation.en: Oh, a peasant boy. Well, this'll be easy. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 是个庶民的孩子 应该不难吧

translation.en: Look, I know what you're thinking.
translation.zh: 听好 我知道你在想些什么

translation.en: "Do my eyes deceive me?" "A super, all-powerful, magical Wish Dragon!"
translation.zh: “我眼花了吧？眼前竟然出现一条所向无敌的许愿神龙！

translation.en: "Could this be real? Is magic real?"
translation.zh: 这是真的吗？ 魔法真的存在？”

translation.en: Now that we got that out of the way, onto the important part.
translation.zh: 如今我们把这事弄清楚了现在要谈要紧事

translation.en: -I fell off the roof. I'm coming for you! -No, no.
translation.zh: -我从屋顶上掉下来了 我来找你了-不行
你没死 活得好好的

translation.en: I am a magical Wish Dragon,
who will grant three wishes to the owner of this teapot.
translation.zh: 我会赐予这个茶壶的主人三个愿望

translation.en: And you, sir, are my master!
translation.zh: 而你 这位先生 就是我的主人！
好了 说吧 赶紧许愿！

translation.en: Okay, you got me. Where are the hidden cameras?
translation.zh: 好吧 我被你们耍了隐藏摄影机在哪里？

translation.en: -Is this a hologram or something? -I assure you not.
translation.zh: -这是全息技术还是什么？-我可以保证不是

translation.en: Do you wish for a suit of armor made of solid gold?
Do you wish for the strength of 1,000 men? Boom!
For the finest carriage in all the land?
translation.zh: 想不想坐上最精致的轿子？

translation.en: Or the legs of a giraffe. Feels good up here, right?
translation.zh: 或是如长颈鹿般的双腿高高在上的感觉不错吧？

translation.en: I'm thinking about starting one of those--
translation.zh: 我想要开一家…你懂的 就是卖小动物的那种店

translation.en: Where they sell animals. Pet-type stores.
translation.zh: 我想要开一家…你懂的 就是卖小动物的那种店 就是卖宠物的那种店

translation.en: You going to sell Chow Chows? That's a good dog.
No one will be selling anything if we don't find that teapot.
translation.zh: 如果找不到那个茶壶谁也别想做买卖

translation.en: Every time I try to make casual conversation,
translation.zh: 每次想跟你们轻松地聊聊

translation.en: you guys give me a hard time.
How many wishes do I get?
-How do you fit in this teapot? -Uh, it's magic. It's a magic teapot.
translation.zh: -这个茶壶怎么容纳得下你？-是魔法 这是魔法茶壶

translation.en: So small. How old are you?
translation.zh: 太小了 你到底几岁了？
-你只要知道…-瞧瞧这小小的手臂

translation.en: Why are you pink? Shouldn't you be green? Your face is so soft. I want to touch it.
translation.zh: 你怎么是粉色的 不是绿色的？你的脸软软的 真想摸摸看
够了 庶民 给我听好

translation.en: I don't have time. I'm not here to be your friend--
translation.zh: 我没时间回答你的问题我也不是来跟你交朋友的

translation.en: Whoa, you have to earn my friendship,
translation.zh: 要跟我交朋友 先要赢得我的尊重

translation.en: and frankly you're not doing a good job.
translation.zh: 说真的 你并没有很尊重我

translation.en: Every Wish Dragon must serve 10 masters
translation.zh: 每条许愿神龙必须为十个主人效力

translation.en: before they're free to enter the spirit world.
And you are the last one.
translation.zh: 你就是我最后一个主人

translation.en: Now, I've been stuck… [high-pitched] …in this teapot for 1,000 years.
translation.zh: 我被困在这个茶壶里一千年了

translation.en: The sooner we get this over with, the better.
translation.zh: 所以越早实现你的愿望越好

translation.en: I'm terribly sorry, young man, but I need that teapot.
translation.zh: 小伙子 十分抱歉请你把那个茶壶交出来

translation.en: Uh, I-- I think it's his. Only the owner of the teapot can see me.
translation.zh: -茶壶好像是他的-只有茶壶的主人看得见我

translation.en: Well, I'm sure he won't miss it.
translation.zh: 我相信他已经不要这个茶壶了

translation.en: No way. I found it. Whoa!
I wish I knew how to fight. [grunts]
[gasps] No, no, no, I didn't mean that.
translation.zh: 不是的 我没有那个意思

translation.en: Give me that teapot right now.
Whoa, I just kicked through a door!
Are you telling me a teenage boy out-fought two full-grown men?
translation.zh: 你是说两个大人竟然打不过一个年轻人？
-两个半才对-你应该亲眼见识一下才对

translation.en: It was 1,000 punches a minute. Kicks everywhere.
translation.zh: 他每分钟挥出一千个拳头拳脚来去无踪

translation.en: I've never seen so many arms and legs.
translation.zh: 我从来没看过这么多手脚

translation.en: The boy knows what he has.
translation.zh: 这个孩子知道他拥有了什么
他拥有的究竟是什么东西？

translation.en: That's none of your business. I'm paying you to find it.
translation.zh: 不关你的事我付钱要你们找到那个东西

translation.en: -That is your only concern. -You haven't paid.
translation.zh: -你们只要在意这点-你还没付钱呢

translation.en: You'll be paid when I have the teapot, beyond your wildest dreams!
translation.zh: 一旦茶壶弄到手后你们自然会得到前所未有的报酬！
老板 请原谅我们的无能

translation.en: But the boy did leave something behind.
translation.zh: 那个孩子留下了某个东西

translation.en: It's only a matter of time before we find him.
-[groggily] How about a kick to the face? -Huh? I said up!
translation.zh: 要不要我给你的脸吃一脚？ 我叫你起床了！
真是一场不可思议的梦
阿丁 我今晚值夜班
晚餐吃剩菜 知道吗？

translation.en: Hey Mom, if you could wish for anything, what would it be?
translation.zh: 妈妈 如果你能实现任何愿望这个愿望会是什么？

translation.en: Din, why are you asking silly questions? Eat.
translation.zh: 为什么问这么无聊的问题？

translation.en: if you could wish for anything.
translation.zh: 如果你能实现任何愿望

translation.en: -A big house in the countryside? -Din, we went over this yesterday.
translation.zh: -像是在郊外有个大豪宅什么的-阿丁 我们昨天说好了

translation.en: I want you to focus on your future.
translation.zh: 我要你把心思放在未来

translation.en: That is what I wish for.
I'm more focused than I've ever been in my entire life.
translation.zh: 这是我这辈子把最多心思放在未来的时候

translation.en: Hmm. Good. Now hurry up. You're gonna be late.
translation.zh: 那就好 快点 你快迟到了

translation.en: -What's that face? I know that. -I don't have a face. What?
translation.zh: 这是什么表情？我懂这个表情 我哪有什么表情？

translation.en: Go to school. Stop planning things.
translation.zh: 赶紧去上学 别做些有的没的

translation.en: One wish down, two to go. We could be done by lunch.
translation.zh: 一个愿望实现了 剩下两个午餐之前 我们就扯平了

translation.en: What did you do to me? Why do I know kung fu?
translation.zh: 你对我做了什么？我怎么忽然懂功夫了？

translation.en: You're welcome. You wish you could fight. I made you a master.
translation.zh: 不客气 你希望你会功夫我就把你变成了功夫大师

translation.en: I didn't wish for… Hey, that's not fair.
translation.zh: 我没许下这个愿望 等一下 这不公平

translation.en: Oh, so just 'cause I said "wish," now I'm stuck with these kung fu powers?
translation.zh: 就因为我说了这个词这辈子就跟功夫离不开了？
好吧 轮到第二个愿望

translation.en: Let me recommend the all-time favorite.
translation.zh: 让我给你推荐一个持久不衰的愿望

translation.en: Now, repeat after me. "I wish for…" You're not talking.
translation.zh: 马上跟着我说 我希望…你怎么不开口？

translation.en: "A giant pile of…" You're not saying anything.
translation.zh: …拥有一堆黄金真奇怪 你竟然不开口

translation.en: Ah, you must be the conquering type. I see that killer instinct in your eyes.
translation.zh: 你肯定是那种想要统领天下的人我看到你眼中的杀气

translation.en: Easy. Just wish for your very own personal army!
translation.zh: 那就简单 你就许愿说你想拥有自家的十万大军！

translation.en: Why would I need an army?
translation.zh: 我为什么要一支十万大军？
那你应该是个简单的人

translation.en: Not to worry. Here's one the peasant-folk love.
translation.zh: 别担心 庶民向来都喜欢许这个愿望

translation.en: I can allow you to speak with a loved one
on the other side of China!
translation.zh: 即使对方在中国的另一端

translation.en: I'm a loved one. I can't hear you. You're very far away.
translation.zh: 我是你的挚爱 我没有你的消息因为你在很遥远的地方

translation.en: -There's a wall here. It's cool, but-- -You mean, like, a cell phone?
translation.zh: 这边隔着一面墙 挺好的只是我无法… 你是指手机吗？

translation.en: How do they fit in this metal box?
translation.zh: 这个小铁盒怎么装得下他们？
两个愿望 任何愿望都行

translation.en: [gasps] The birthday party. I know what I want.
translation.zh: 生日派对 我知道我想要什么了
等等 你要许一个愿望？

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Uh, riding my magical Wish Dragon. Away!
translation.zh: 你想干什么？ 骑上我的许愿神龙 出发了！

translation.en: If you're not gonna let me ride you, we catch the bus.
translation.zh: 既然你不肯让我骑上去我们只好搭公车了

translation.en: The "bus"? Is that some kind of animal?
translation.zh: 公车？ 是什么牲畜吗？

translation.en: -How long have you been in that teapot? -Is it still the Qing Dynasty?
translation.zh: 你待在那个茶壶里多久了？ 不知道 现在还是清朝吗？

translation.en: How did you get in there?
Don't ignore me when I'm talking, peasant.
translation.zh: 说话啊 我在跟你说话呢 庶民

translation.en: It's not a little man. It's television.
translation.zh: 龙兄 那不是小人 而是电视机

translation.en: Ah, the spoils of war on display?

translation.zh: -这是某种看不到的力量吗？-是玻璃！
听着 我知道这些东西在你看来很新奇

translation.en: When you've been around as long as I have,
translation.zh: 如果你活得跟我一样长久

translation.en: there's nothing in this world that could amaze--
translation.zh: 天下没有什么足以让我感到新奇的…

translation.en: -You gonna make a wish now? -I will. Just wait until we get there.
translation.zh: -你要许愿了吗？-抵达目的地后 我就会许愿了

translation.en: A giant chariot made of steel and glass!
translation.zh: 用钢铁和玻璃制成的大战车

translation.en: Long, this is bus. Come on.
translation.zh: 龙兄 这就是公车 走吧

translation.en: -And watch your step. Carefully. -Thank you, kind sir.
translation.zh: -小心走路 慢点-谢了 年轻人

translation.en: -No. There must be a better… -Long, what are you doing?
translation.zh: -不行 肯定有更好的…-龙兄 你干吗？

translation.en: I can't afford a personal carriage, which is why we were taking the bus.
translation.zh: 我坐不起私轿 所以才要搭巴士

translation.en: Did you just steal my money?

translation.zh: -…到时就赶不上跨城快车了-给你

translation.en: -Hey, where did you get this? -You know, magic.
I, uh, had a really big lunch.

translation.zh: 这是久久才发生一次吗？

translation.en: You mean to tell me this happens every single day?
translation.zh: 还是你想告诉我 这种情况… 天天… 都在上演？

translation.en: The sun is moving faster than us.
translation.zh: 就连太阳都移动得比我们快

translation.en: This is worse than my teapot.
translation.zh: 这比困在茶壶里更难受

translation.en: Ugh! I'm never going to make it in time. I wish this traffic would just--
translation.zh: 我一定赶不上的 真希望交通马上…

translation.en: Long, I'm not gonna waste a wish on traffic!
translation.zh: 我才不会把愿望浪费在解决堵车问题上

translation.en: -Look, Din, you're gonna have to use-- -[honking]
You son of a cabbage farmer! There is no place to go!
translation.zh: 该死的菜农 我们哪里也去不了！

translation.en: Blow your trumpet all you want. It won't make any difference at all!
translation.zh: 你尽管吹喇叭吧任凭你怎么吹也没用

translation.en: You know, Long, we'll get there eventually.
translation.zh: 龙兄 我们一定会抵达目的地的

translation.en: Even if it takes all day.
translation.zh: 就算这意味着要花上一整天

translation.en: I heard one traffic jam lasted three weeks. [sighs]
translation.zh: 我听说有一次堵车堵了整整三个星期

translation.en: If only I had a magical dragon that could fly.
translation.zh: 要是有一条能载着我飞越城市的神龙就好了

translation.en: I know what you're trying. Not gonna work.
translation.zh: 我知道你打什么主意 休想说服我

translation.en: I spent 1,000 years in that teapot. I can spend hours in your traffic.
translation.zh: 我在茶壶里待了一千年堵车堵几个小时算什么

translation.en: Hey, I got an idea. Why don't we listen to the tiny orchestra while we wait?
translation.zh: 我有个办法 等待交通恢复之际不妨听些小乐曲

translation.en: Careful what you don't wish for.
-Push me too far, I will not hesitate to-- -Fly everywhere?
translation.zh: 要是把我逼得太紧我会毫不犹豫地… 毫不犹豫地到处飞？

translation.en: You're amazing! Look. Is there anything you can't do?
translation.zh: 你好厉害 你瞧瞧你还有什么是做不到的？

translation.en: [chuckles awkwardly] Anyways, where are we going?
translation.zh: 话说回来 要上哪儿去？

translation.en: Ah, there it is! Down there.
Excellent. I see where this is going.
translation.zh: 挑得好 我懂你要什么了

translation.en: Now, when choosing a palace, it is very important that--
translation.zh: 挑选宫殿时 一定要…
别闹了 这是要紧事

translation.en: -Thank you for coming. -Li Na, happy birthday.
translation.zh: -感谢捧场-俐娜 生日快乐
龙兄 这是我第二个愿望

translation.en: -I can't do love. -What? No, Long, it's not--
translation.zh: -我对爱无能为力-什么？不是的 龙兄 我不要…

translation.en: Couple of rules. I can't time travel, I can't kill,
translation.zh: 有几个规则穿梭时空、杀人我做不到

translation.en: and it pains me to inform you, not really, I can't make people fall in love with you.
translation.zh: 还有一点说出来我也心痛 我不能让任何人爱上你

translation.en: No, no, no, it's not like that, Long.
translation.zh: 不是的 龙兄 你误会了
我希望我的朋友能回到我身边

translation.en: Wait, rewind. You can wish for anything in the whole world,
translation.zh: 等等 倒带一下 你能实现天底下任何愿望结果你却要浪费在一个朋友身上？

translation.en: and you waste it on a friend?
translation.zh: 你能实现天底下任何愿望结果你却要浪费在一个朋友身上？
有什么比友情更重要呢？

translation.en: Let me think, a golden chamber pot, a palace made entirely of jade,
translation.zh: 让我想想黄金便盆、用玉石盖成的宫殿

translation.en: an army of terracotta warriors! Why are you wasting a wish on some girl?
translation.zh: 一支兵马俑 为什么要把愿望浪费在一个女孩身上？

translation.en: Sorry, I can't expect you to understand.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我不能期待你会理解我还没跟你解释整个故事呢

translation.en: I haven't explained everything. Down, please.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我不能期待你会理解我还没跟你解释整个故事呢 请把我放下

translation.en: Ten years ago, a cool spring day. A gentle breeze.
translation.zh: 十年前 在一个风和日暖的春天

translation.en: A lonely boy waits after school. Me.
translation.zh: 有个寂寞的男孩放学后等妈妈来接他那个男孩就是我了

translation.en: Enter the girl, Li Na, throwing dumplings and defending my honor. Then we…
translation.zh: 结果女主角俐娜出场了她抛出饺子来捍卫我的尊严

translation.en: [Long] This is really happening. This should be so easy.
translation.zh: -然后…-竟然发生这种事？ 应该没那么难吧

translation.en: Three wishes and I'm done. But no, I get stuck with this simpleton.
translation.zh: 只要许三个愿望 我就升仙了 可是… 我被这个低智商的家伙难倒了

translation.en: Just look at him with his mindless grin.
What have I done to deserve this?
And then she drove away and I never saw her again.
translation.zh: 接着车子把她送走了之后我再也没见到她

translation.en: It's okay, Long. I get emotional too just talking about it.
translation.zh: 不要紧的 龙兄说起这段往事 我也感触满满

translation.en: I can't make people fall in love. Why would I make someone your friend?
translation.zh: 我跟你说过了 我无法让别人爱上你 你怎么会觉得我能让某人跟你交朋友？

translation.en: What? No, she's already my friend. I just need to get into the party.
translation.zh: 什么？不是 我们已经是朋友了我只是想去参加这场派对

translation.en: A wish! Why didn't you just say so?
translation.zh: 这就是一个愿望为什么不早说呢？

translation.en: Yeah, I wish to be a princeling.
translation.zh: 我想要成为一个高富帅

translation.en: All right, here we go. Stand back and it shall be so!
translation.zh: 很好 来吧 退后 如你所愿！

translation.en: Done and done. Now, onto that final wish.
translation.zh: 搞定 轮到最后一个愿望了

translation.en: What? I made you a prince.
translation.zh: 什么情况？我把你变成王子了
不是 我是指高富帅

translation.en: Like one of those guys with the fancy suit,
translation.zh: 就像这种人 身穿笔挺西装

translation.en: the Rolex watch and the chauffeured car,
translation.zh: 戴着劳力士手表有辆配有司机的轿车

translation.en: That's like ten different wishes. You have two.
translation.zh: 等等 这是十个不同的愿望你只有两个愿望

translation.en: Fine. How about a temporary version, just for today?
translation.zh: 那就把时间缩短吧 就只有今天

translation.en: You're seriously going to wish to be rich for 24 hours?
translation.zh: 你只想当一天的有钱人？

translation.en: I just need to reconnect with Li Na. She won't care if I'm poor.
translation.zh: 我只想跟俐娜做回朋友 她不会在乎我是穷是富的
不好意思 我笑了我从没听过这么愚蠢的话

translation.en: but that is the dumbest thing I've ever heard. Of course she'll care.
translation.zh: 不好意思 我笑了我从没听过这么愚蠢的话 她绝对在乎

translation.en: Yeah, well, it's my wish and not yours.
translation.zh: 但这是我的愿望 不是你的愿望

translation.en: Shoot me with your magic juice.
And the personal assistant who has to do everything I ask for the next 24 hours.
translation.zh: 还有一个24小时随我使唤的私人助理

translation.en: Long, you look good as a human. Now, walking can be tricky, but--
translation.zh: 龙兄 你的人形真帅啊 听着 走路不容易 可是…

translation.en: [bald man] Good afternoon. I'd like to inquire about a customer.
translation.zh: 先生 下午好我想向你要某个客户的资料

translation.en: [chuckles] Oh, yeah. Now, these are my kind of people.
translation.zh: 好极了 这些都是我这种水平的人

translation.en: The servants' entrance is around back.
-I've never been so humiliated in-- -Coat check, thank you.
translation.zh: -我从未受过如此侮辱-麻烦放进衣帽间 谢谢

translation.en: -Li Na. -It's so good to see you again.
translation.zh: -俐娜-嗨 很高兴再次见到你

translation.en: How does it feel to be 19, dear?
Oh, well, I've actually been feeling really confused lately--
translation.zh: 其实我最近感到非常烦恼…

translation.en: Great, dear. What would you say about being the new face of Shin Makeup?
translation.zh: 很好 亲爱的想不想成为信化妆品的新面孔？

translation.en: Actually, I no longer rep products that use animal testing.
translation.zh: 其实 我已经不再使用用动物测试过的产品了

translation.en: I'll have him sign the contract.
-Li Na! -It's so great to see you again!
I want to talk about your future.
translation.zh: 我们来聊聊你的未来吧

translation.en: I've been thinking about my future.
translation.zh: 我最近一直在思考自己的未来

translation.en: Inflatable bras, the future of fashion. I want you to be a part.
translation.zh: 充气胸罩是时尚的未来我希望你能参与
-是啊 但我不确定…-好极了

translation.en: I'll have a shoot scheduled ASAP.
-Happy birthday! -It's so-- Oh, it's you, Buckley.
translation.zh: -生日快乐-真是… 原来是你 巴克利

translation.en: We're halfway through the list. You're doing great.
translation.zh: 宾客都差不多到齐了 你表现得很好

translation.en: Yeah, great. Any word from my dad?
translation.zh: 很好 我爸有没有说什么？

translation.en: He's working hard, just like we are.
translation.zh: 我相信他跟我们一样正在勤奋地工作

translation.en: So, how about a little bit less of this,
All right, Din. [exhales] Here we go.
translation.zh: 好了 阿丁 去吧
知道了 戴上假面具

translation.en: -Whoo. Here we go! -Hi, Li Na! Happy--
Hi, it's so great to see you again.
translation.zh: 嗨 很高兴再次见到你

translation.en: -Oh, i feel that same way. So-- -This is just the greatest day of my life.
translation.zh: -我也是 所以…-今天是我人生中最美好的一天

translation.en: Uh, wait, before I forget, I brought you a little something.
translation.zh: 等等 趁我还记得我给你带了这份小礼物

translation.en: -Hi, it's so good to see you again. -Actually, we never met.
translation.zh: -嗨 很高兴再次见到你-其实这是我们第一次见面

translation.en: -If I may? -Hi, it's so great to see you again.
translation.zh: -赏面跳支舞吧-嗨 很高兴再次见到你

translation.en: I… I don't know what happened.
Great. Dreams crushed. We're done here, right?
translation.zh: 很好 美梦碎了 任务结束了 对吧？服务员 再给我两杯
任务结束了 对吧？服务员 再给我两杯

translation.en: [emcee] Ladies and gentlemen, time for a treat.
If we could have the birthday girl and her father come to the dance floor…
translation.zh: 有请寿星和她父亲走到舞池中央

translation.en: And now her father, Mr. Wang, come to the stage.
-Come on, Dad. Don't be shy. -Mr. Wang?
translation.zh: -出来吧 爸爸 别害羞-王先生！

translation.en: I'm sure he'll be here any second.
Wang? Do I have the right name?
translation.zh: 是王先生吧？我有没有念错？

translation.en: What kind of father doesn't show up to his daughter's birthday?
translation.zh: 连自己女儿的生日也不在场当什么爸爸？

translation.en: -We gotta do something. -[emcee] Mic was on. I apologize.
translation.zh: -我们得想想办法-麦克风没关 不好意思

translation.en: [Din] Ladies and gentlemen, if I could have your attention here.
translation.zh: 各位先生女士 请注意

translation.en: It's time for the entertainment portion.
translation.zh: 马上迎来今晚的余兴节目环节

translation.en: [Din] From the streets of Shaolin, kung fu like you've never seen it before.
translation.zh: 这是你们前所未见的少林功夫

translation.en: Trained in the art of Dragon Style.
Now, everyone, keep your eyes on the stage as I…
translation.zh: 各位 把焦点转向舞台 我要…

translation.en: Uh, that's it. Show's over. Thank you, folks. Bye!
translation.zh: 好了 表演结束 谢谢 后会有期
先生 要不要来点鱼子酱开胃菜？

translation.en: You don't have any, uh, shrimp chips, do you?
What's a man like you doing all by himself?
translation.zh: 像你这样的男人怎么会自己一个人？

translation.en: So true. Who needs wine when you have good company?
translation.zh: 可不是吗？佳人在侧 又何须美酒？

translation.en: [laughs] I don't normally move this fast, but…
translation.zh: 通常我都会慢慢来 可是…

translation.en: Playing hard to get, I see.
Water. Water. I just need water.
-Li Na, is that you? -Go away. I'm busy.
translation.zh: -俐娜 是你吗？-走开 我很忙

translation.en: Ah, yeah, I can see you're busy.
I'm the one who did that whole kung fu thing.
translation.zh: 我是刚才那个上台表演功夫的人

translation.en: I know what you were trying to do.
Just… just one night out of the whole year,
translation.zh: 一… 一整年下来 就只有这个晚上我以为…

translation.en: I thought maybe he could make time.
translation.zh: 一整年下来 就只有这个晚上我以为… 他会为我抽出时间

translation.en: I don't know why I'm letting it get to me.
translation.zh: 我不知道我为什么要为难自己

translation.en: This is so embarrassing. I don't normally cry like this.
translation.zh: 真是太丢脸了我通常不会哭成这样了

translation.en: Here, you got a little something on your face.
Yeah, it's not really coming off.
[gasps] I'm sorry. I must look totally crazy.
translation.zh: 对不起 我的样子一定很难看

translation.en: I just… don't know what else to do.
translation.zh: 我只是… 不知道该怎么办才好

translation.en: It's like, I can see my whole life laid out ahead of me,
translation.zh: 我已经可以预见未来的人生道路了

translation.en: and I'm trying my best, trying to make everyone proud,
translation.zh: 我已经尽力让每个人为我感到骄傲了 可是…

translation.en: but… no matter how hard I try, I just feel like…
translation.zh: 无论我多努力 我总觉得…
找到你了 狡猾的男人
不好意思 我是不是…

translation.en: I'm sorry for being so rude. I don't think I got your name earlier.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我失礼了 我好像还不知道你的名字

translation.en: There you are. Miss Wang, thank goodness.
translation.zh: 找到你了 王小姐 谢天谢地

translation.en: Just in time. Your father will be here any second.
translation.zh: 及时找到你了 你父亲随时会到
俐娜 终于见到你了

translation.en: -Oh. Hi, Dad. -Buckley informs me the party was perfect.
translation.zh: 嗨 爸爸 巴克利跟我说派对非常顺利

translation.en: -Thank you, Dad. -You had a good time?
translation.zh: -谢谢你 爸爸-你玩得开心吗？

translation.en: Yes, of course. I spoke to everyone you wanted me to
translation.zh: 当然开心了我跟你吩咐我要认识的人都聊过了

translation.en: and I think I was able to make some really important… connections.
translation.zh: 我相信已经跟他们建立起非常有益的… 关系

translation.en: Hello? Hello? Ah, there we go.
Here, I brought you something special.
translation.zh: 我给你买了一份稀有的礼物

translation.en: I had to send my assistant to half the jewelers in Shanghai.
translation.zh: 我派助理跑遍上海将近一半的珠宝店才找到的

translation.en: -I know you appreciate something special. -Oh, of course.
translation.zh: 我知道你一定会喜欢这种非常稀有的东西 当然了 跟去年的礼物差不多

translation.en: Just as much as last year.
translation.zh: 当然了 跟去年的礼物差不多

translation.en: Oh, uh, did I? Na Na, I'm sorry. You know, I--
translation.zh: 我是不是…娜娜 对不起你懂的 我…

translation.en: Well, you can never have too much of a good thing, right?
translation.zh: 凡事都不一定尽如人意 对吧？

translation.en: Excuse me, I… I didn't see you there, young man.
translation.zh: 不好意思 年轻人 我不知道你也在场

translation.en: Allow me to get you a closer look, sir.
[Mr. Wang] Good quality leather, excellent suit, Rolex.
translation.zh: 优质皮革 笔挺西装 劳力士手表

translation.en: I mean, Dumpling House. I mean, restaurants in general.
translation.zh: 我是指饺子馆 有好几家

translation.en: Ah, a young man of means, I see. Reminds me of myself.
translation.zh: 原来是个富豪 让我想到了自己
你俩明天下午一起吃饭吧
-爸爸-好啊 没问题 -求之不得-好极了

translation.en: Let's have arrangements made. Forgive my manners.
translation.zh: 我们见个面吧抱歉 我失礼了 年轻人
-阿丹-阿丹 很高兴认识你

translation.en: Where would you like to go?
translation.zh: 俐娜 你想去哪里吃饭？

translation.en: The Pearl Tower's excellent. I have a reservation--
translation.zh: 珍珠塔有一家很棒的餐厅我有一个永久的桌位

translation.en: -Excuse me, sir. A very important call. -Just give me a few minutes.
translation.zh: -抱歉 有一通非常重要的来电-再等一下

translation.en: Sir, they said they need to talk now.
translation.zh: 对方说要马上跟你联系

translation.en: Good evening, sorry to keep you waiting.
translation.zh: 晚上好 抱歉 让你们久等了

translation.en: So, um, would you really like to--
We talked and it was just like old times.
translation.zh: 接着我们开始聊天就像回到以前一样

translation.en: We made arrangements to have lunch. Can you believe it?
translation.zh: 我们还说好了明天下午一起吃饭很难相信吧？

translation.en: I can't believe you didn't explain what a toilet is.
translation.zh: 你竟然没跟我说明厕所究竟是什么

translation.en: Uh, I'll come clean when the time's right.
translation.zh: 等时机对了 我自然会表明身份

translation.en: You're not gonna, because there is no right time.
translation.zh: 你是不会表明身份的因为根本没有对的时机

translation.en: You're the peasant, she's the princess.
translation.zh: 我懂 你是庶民 她是公主

translation.en: Tale as old as time. And we all know how that ends.
translation.zh: 这种故事已经是陈腔滥调了我们都知道结局
-结局是好的吗？-不好 悲剧收场 大悲剧！

translation.en: Long, we have a special bond that runs deeper than money or status.
translation.zh: 我和俐娜之前有着某种更深层的关系超越金钱和身份

translation.en: Because the minute Li Na finds out who you are, this will all fall apart.
translation.zh: 因为一旦俐娜发现你真实的身份一切都会分崩离析

translation.en: You should learn to have faith in humanity.
translation.zh: 你应该学习对人性有点信心

translation.en: I've been around for 1,000 years. I know how humans work. Not you.
translation.zh: 学习？我已经活了一千年了 我很清楚人性是什么

translation.en: -Poor Long. I see your problem. -You're my problem.
translation.zh: -龙兄 我懂你的烦恼了-你就是我的烦恼

translation.en: I wouldn't expect your tiny, reptilian brain to understand
translation.zh: 我不会期望你这个小小的爬虫类脑袋

translation.en: It's okay. I'll be your first and only friend. Come here.
translation.zh: 不要紧的 我当你第一个也是唯一的朋友抱一个吧

translation.en: I had a million friends when I was human. Oh, no.
translation.zh: 我还是人类时 朋友可多了 糟糕

translation.en: -were you a-- -Yes, yes, I was human.
translation.zh: -你以前是…-对啊 我以前是人类

translation.en: For heaven's sake, have you even looked at the teapot?
translation.zh: 天啊 你到底有没有仔细看过这个茶壶？

translation.en: And I was the best human ever!
translation.zh: 我是天底下最优质的人

translation.en: One of the most beloved, respected lords in history! You know why?
translation.zh: 我是中国历史上最受人爱戴和敬仰的君主 知道为什么吗？

translation.en: I had all the wealth and land and power, and everyone loved me for it.
translation.zh: 因为财富、土地和权力我都不缺这就是人人都爱我的原因

translation.en: Wait, if you're so great, why haven't I heard of you?
translation.zh: 既然你这么伟大为什么我没听说过你呢？

translation.en: We-- Well, obviously some jealous rival took credit for everything after I died.
translation.zh: 显然是某个对我嫉恨如仇的人 趁我死后抢走了我一切功劳

translation.en: You died. The heavens made you a Wish Dragon?
translation.zh: 于是你死后天界把你变成一条许愿神龙？
-你好像对这个赏赐不太满意-我非常满意

translation.en: So, if you would just use your last wish,
translation.zh: 所以我劝你善用最后一个愿望

translation.en: and wish for the same thing as every other master,
translation.zh: 许下每个主人曾许下的愿望
到时我就能永远离开这个可悲的世界

translation.en: And finally return back to heaven,
where everyone is waiting to welcome the great emperor home with a parade.
translation.zh: 到时众仙家都会列队欢迎天帝重返天界

translation.en: My point is there's a simple solution to every problem in the world.
translation.zh: 我的重点是天底下每个烦恼都有一个简单的解决方法
包括你的烦恼在内 用吧

translation.en: So, that's what you've learned after all these years?
translation.zh: 这些年来 你学到的就是这个道理？

translation.en: Crap, ten o'clock? My mom's getting off work.
translation.zh: 糟糕 晚上10点了 我妈快下班了

translation.en: Long, we gotta go! Hurry! Let's go!
translation.zh: 龙兄 我们快走吧 快点！

translation.en: [Mr. Wang] Sir, surely you can extend the loan one more week.
translation.zh: 先生 你准能把付款期限延迟一个星期吧

translation.en: I promise, I can pay you back, sir.
translation.zh: 我答应你到时一定会还钱

translation.en: Foreclosure? Please, sir. I'm begging you.
translation.zh: 取消赎取权？不要啊 我求你了

translation.en: This company is my life's work. I have a family and a respons--
translation.zh: 这家公司是我毕生的心血我有家人要照顾 还有责任要…

translation.en: just don't tell Li Na about any of this.
We've located the boy's apartment, sir.
translation.zh: 老板 我们找到那个孩子的公寓了

translation.en: There's no way he can come or go without being caught.
translation.zh: 这次我们一定能抓住他

translation.en: Okay, in the teapot. Everything's normal.
translation.zh: 龙兄 赶紧躲进茶壶里 确保毫无异样

translation.en: -Lights on. -Think you can bring Li Na to this dump?
translation.zh: -开灯-你打算带俐娜到这个邋遢的地方？

translation.en: Her fridge is bigger than this apartment.
translation.zh: 她家的冰柜都比这间公寓还大

translation.en: If you're not gonna say something helpful, don't say anything.
translation.zh: 如果说不出好听的话…脱鞋 就什么都别说

translation.en: Hello, Mother. Sure is hot out tonight, isn't it?
translation.zh: 嗨 妈妈 今晚外面很热吧？

translation.en: No, it's freezing. You coming down with something?
translation.zh: 不会啊 很冷  -你是不是病了？-没有 只是…
-你是不是病了？-没有 只是… -在温习-好吧 拿去

translation.en: -I'll heat you up some leftovers. -Li Na will love leftovers.
translation.zh: -我去弄热剩菜-俐娜肯定爱吃剩菜 对吧？

translation.en: Uh, stop worrying about me. I'm fine.
translation.zh: 我是说别再为我操心了 -我没事-你看起来不像没事
-学校还好吗？-很好 学校好极了

translation.en: You lie to everyone, not just yourself.
translation.zh: 你不只欺骗自己 还欺骗别人
不是的 妈妈 我刚才只是…

translation.en: -You know where to find me. -…talking to somebody else.
translation.zh: -你知道到哪儿可以找到我-…跟别人说话

translation.en: Din, I'm going to ask you a question.
translation.zh: 阿丁 我要问你一件事
别忘了 我是你妈妈

translation.en: You can tell me the truth.
-No. Gimme that! I'm not drinking. -Where are you hiding it?
translation.zh: -不要 还给我！-你在藏什么？ 妈妈 我没喝酒

translation.en: Don't lie to me! Staying out late! Skipping school!

translation.zh: -你最近老是疯疯癫癫的-妈妈！

translation.en: I am your mother! I know when something is wrong.
translation.zh: 我是你妈妈 我知道你不对劲

translation.en: Just tell me the truth. Whatever it is, I can help.
translation.zh: 我只要你说真话无论实情是什么 我都愿意帮你

translation.en: Don't come out if you're going to disrespect me.
translation.zh: 等你学会尊重我后才出来

translation.en: -They're really going at it. -Bring that chair.

translation.zh: 你要好好填饱肚子才行

translation.en: Hey, little buddy. You're so cute. You have family? Are you hungry?
translation.zh: 嗨 小家伙 你真可爱有家人吗？饿了吗？

translation.en: You're such a cute, fluffy, little, hairy-faced… [babbling]
translation.zh: 你真是个毛茸茸的小可爱

translation.en: Okay, Din. You can do this.
translation.zh: 好了 阿丁 你行的
只要把真相告诉她就对了

translation.en: -Sir, may I take your jacket? -My jacket? I just got this.
translation.zh: -先生 请把外套给我-外套？我刚弄来的

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah, good one. Sure. I have plenty more of these at home.
translation.zh: 是啊 不错 没问题 我家里还有很多
抱歉 这么多繁文缛节

translation.en: My dad insists on "only the best."
translation.zh: 我爸爸坚持什么都要最好的

translation.en: Actually, Li Na, there's something I need to tell you.
translation.zh: 俐娜 其实我有事想要告诉你

translation.en: I know what you're gonna say.
It's so nice to meet someone from a respectable family that you enjoy talking to, right?
translation.zh: 很高兴认识一个聊得来的富家子女吧？
小姐 桌位准备好了

translation.en: Long, I'm supposed to be from a respectable family.
translation.zh: 龙兄 你听见了吗？她以为我是富家子弟

translation.en: No. What? I'm shocked. I'm stunned.
translation.zh: 不会吧？真是太意外了 真没想到

translation.en: -It's exactly what I predicted. -I need your help.
translation.zh: 等等 正如我所料 请你帮帮我

translation.en: You were from royalty. Tell me what to do.
translation.zh: 你是皇亲国戚 赶紧告诉我该怎么办

translation.en: Fine. Do exactly what I say.
translation.zh: 好吧 只要照着我的话去做就行了

translation.en: -Okay. Deal. -Sir, could I offer you a hot tow--
translation.zh: -好的 我们说好了-先生 您需要热毛巾…

translation.en: You shouldn't let commoners talk to you.
translation.zh: 首先 你不能跟这些庶民交谈

translation.en: wanted to offer you a hot towel.
translation.zh: 想… 给您一条热… 毛巾…先生…你刚才…
小姐 桌位准备好了

translation.en: Demand another table, claiming it's far superior.
translation.zh: 要求另一个桌位说那个桌位比较高级

translation.en: Li Na, this table simply won't do. Allow me to show you another one.
translation.zh: 俐娜 这个桌位显然不够好我带你去另一个桌位

translation.en: This is the table for the hors d'oeuvres.
translation.zh: 阿丹 这是开胃菜的桌位

translation.en: Well, you tell Mr. and Mrs. Hors D'oeuvres that this is our table.
translation.zh: 麻烦你转告开胃菜这才是我们要的桌位

translation.en: Dan, you're such a funny guy.
[laughs] Funny? Uh, are you sure you didn't mean suave, classy, respectable.
translation.zh: 有趣？你确定你不是想赞我风度翩翩品味独特、尊贵大气吗？

translation.en: You're too good. I'm gonna cry.
translation.zh: 你太厉害了 我笑得快流泪了

translation.en: I would have her executed for mocking royalty.
translation.zh: 这种行为是在藐视皇室换成我早就把她斩了

translation.en: I appreciate you trying to make this place interesting,
translation.zh: 感谢你设法让这种地方变得没那么无聊
不如我们去其他地方吧？

translation.en: Somewhere else? Like more fancy than this?
translation.zh: 其他地方？比这里高级的地方？
这个地方不够高级？好样的 孩子

translation.en: -Well played, child. -No, like, a walk or something.
translation.zh: 这个地方不够高级？好样的 孩子 不是的 我是指去散步什么的
晚上好 请问要点什么？

translation.en: -Spare no expense. Money's no object. -One of everything.
translation.zh: -尽情撒钱 钱不是问题-每一道菜都来一份

translation.en: Sir, there are over 600 items on our menu.
translation.zh: 先生 我们的菜单上有超过600道菜
-那就每一道菜都来三份-好样的！

translation.en: So, listen, Dan, about last night,
translation.zh: 阿丹 你听我说 昨晚上
抱歉 我表现得非常奇怪

translation.en: To be honest, it's nice to have someone who listened.
translation.zh: 说真的 能找到一个懂得聆听我的人我非常开心
别理她 她就是你的人了

translation.en: Look. Rich people never pay attention to anyone else.
translation.zh: 阿丁 环顾四周有钱人不会把心思放在别人身上

translation.en: All they talk about is their own business, how much money they make.
translation.zh: 他们只聊自己的生意、赚多少钱

translation.en: -It's almost an art form. -Are you listening to anything I said?
translation.zh: -就像某种艺术形式-阿丹 你有没有听我说话？

translation.en: Um, okay, well, I was saying it was really nice to talk to you…
translation.zh: 好吧 我刚才说… 昨晚跟你聊得很开心 因为…

translation.en: We're close, Din. Tell her how many palaces you own.
translation.zh: 很接近了 最后一步跟她说你有多少宫殿

translation.en: Let me stop you. Did I tell you just how respectable my family is?
translation.zh: 俐娜 打住我有没有跟你说过我家有多富有？

translation.en: -You're just not who I thought you were. -Wait, Li Na.
translation.zh: 我真是看错人了 等等 俐娜

translation.en: I don't understand. That worked on all 17 of my wives.
translation.zh: 我不明白我17个老婆都是这样嫁给我的

translation.en: We should go for that walk.
translation.zh: 我们应该听你的 出去走走吧

translation.en: Gangsters. Probably out to kidnap us for a ransom.
translation.zh: 黑帮分子 可能想绑架我们要赎金

translation.en: You've always wanted to be in a street fight.
translation.zh: 俐娜 你一直很想跟别人干架
看我在垃圾堆里找到了什么

translation.en: [Long] Look at me. How did I become a piñata?
translation.zh: 瞧瞧我这条龙 变成了一个纸玩

translation.en: So, when exactly were you going to apologize, Dan?
translation.zh: 阿丹 你打算什么时候道歉？

translation.en: Li Na, I really do want to say I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 俐娜 我是真心想跟你道歉的

translation.en: Sorry for acting like such a jerk.
translation.zh: 抱歉我刚才表现得像个人渣

translation.en: Now, get him, Dan. Kick him right in his stupid face!
translation.zh: 揍他 阿丹狠狠地踢他那张难看的脸！
小子 把茶壶交出来

translation.en: I didn't sign up for this. If you made your last wish, we-- Oh, no.
translation.zh: 我没要参与打斗只要许下最后一个愿望 我们… 完了

translation.en: This literally could not get any wo--
translation.zh: 这是我经历过最糟糕的…

translation.en: How do you like them apples, huh?
-Li Na, I think we're gonna have to-- -Jump!

translation.zh: 老大 放心吧 交给我们

translation.en: You know what, Dan? This is turning into a pretty good date.
translation.zh: 阿丹 这段经历居然演变成一个非常精彩的约会

translation.en: [Long] I'm fine. Thank you for asking.
translation.zh: 我也没事 感谢你的慰问

translation.en: What happened? Well, we jumped off a building.
translation.zh: 怎么回事？我刚从高楼跳下来

translation.en: -Your 24 hours are over. -We beat up some gangsters.
translation.zh: -24小时没了-我们狠狠揍了几个黑帮分子
-糟糕-我知道多数是你的功劳

translation.en: You gotta teach me some of that kung fu.
translation.zh: 但说真的 你一定要教我几招

translation.en: Wait, what happened to your suit?
There's… something I need to tell you.
translation.zh: 有件事… 我必须告诉你

translation.en: You have one more wish. You don't have to do this.
translation.zh: 你还有一个愿望 没必要摊牌
可是… 为什么要骗我？

translation.en: I wasn't planning to. I just…
translation.zh: 我本来没那个打算的 只是我…

translation.en: I was worried that if you found out it was, well, just me,
translation.zh: 我担心要是你发现其实… 是我

translation.en: So, you still live around here?

translation.zh: 还住在那个旧石库门里？

translation.en: I told you this wouldn't end well.
translation.zh: 我跟你说过了 不会有好下场的

translation.en: We used to take a shortcut through here on the way home from school.
translation.zh: 放学后 我们经常抄这条捷径回家

translation.en: And Mrs. Chu would sell those roasted yams.
translation.zh: 朱大妈以前在这里卖烤山药

translation.en: Hey, look at that! It's Mrs. Chu!
Hi, Mrs. Chu. It's Li Na Wang.
translation.zh: 嗨 朱大妈 我是王俐娜

translation.en: -Do you remember-- -One buck, two yams. No bargaining!
translation.zh: -你还记得…-一块钱两个山药 没商量
成交 下一个 闪开
可不是吗？新时代 新运动裤

translation.en: Hey, Din, what do you think about a little race?
So, your old apartment has to be right around the corner.
translation.zh: 你的旧公寓应该就在附近

translation.en: Oh, I don't know if that's such a good idea.
translation.zh: 我不知道这样合不合适

translation.en: -Hey Weijing, you have any green onions? -Hi, Mrs. Song.
translation.zh: -薇晶 你那边有没有青葱？-嗨 宋太太

translation.en: I'm sorry. Do I know you?
translation.zh: 不好意思 我们认识吗？
家里来了个意想不到的客人

translation.en: A girl? That's why you're acting crazy?
translation.zh: 一个女孩？难怪你最近行为反常

translation.en: All this time worried you were drugged out in some internet cafe. It was a girl.
translation.zh: -别打了-这阵子我都在担心你流连网咖 原来是为了一个女孩

translation.en: Li Na? What are you doing here?
[Mrs. Song grunts] Well, where are my manners? Come in.
translation.zh: 我真是失礼了 进来吧

translation.en: You and I are not finished.
Well, her nose is a little flat.
-You really shouldn't go to-- -You're skinnier than a broom handle.
translation.zh: -你真的没必要…-你比扫把还要瘦

translation.en: Did you know Din puts flowers on Clucky's grave every year?
translation.zh: 你知道阿丁每年都会跑到小鸡的坟前献花吗？

translation.en: He's so cute. He even cries a little.
translation.zh: 他真可爱 他还哭了呢

translation.en: I am not crying. I am mourning.
translation.zh: 我才没有哭 我只是在哀悼

translation.en: What? You're saying that's not my son?
translation.zh: 什么？你是说他不是我的儿子？

translation.en: You knew. Don't lie to me.
translation.zh: 你明知道是怎么回事 别骗我

translation.en: [man] You were lying to me this whole time.
translation.zh: 不是的 是你一直在骗我

translation.en: You just wanted to inherit my dad's business.
translation.zh: 你只是想继承我爸的生意

translation.en: -[woman] Right. I will. -I know what you did!
translation.zh: -没错 我一定会-我知道你做过什么

translation.en: You think you can fool me? I saw you with that guy.
translation.zh: 你以为你骗得了我吗？ 我看见你和那个男人在一起

translation.en: I should've listened to my mother.
translation.zh: 早知道我就听我妈妈的话

translation.en: Oh, wow. Oh! It's like a time machine up here.
Yeah, sorry. This is the only place I can get peace and quiet.
translation.zh: 是啊 抱歉 这是我唯一能得到一丝平静和安宁的地方

translation.en: Because the ghost of Clucky will always haunt you!
translation.zh: 因为小鸡的鬼魂会一直缠着你！
不要 小鸡 你已经死了

translation.en: Are you gonna cry? Are we gonna see tears now?
translation.zh: 你会哭吗？我会看到你流泪吗？

translation.en: I regret nothing. You were delicious.
translation.zh: 我不后悔 因为你很好吃

translation.en: You're gonna know what regret tastes like.
translation.zh: 你很快就会尝到后悔的滋味了

translation.en: Get away from me, you ghost chicken.
translation.zh: 不要 滚开 你这个鸡的鬼魂

translation.en: -Why did you eat me? -It was Li Na. She made me do it.
translation.zh: -为什么？为什么要吃掉我？-是俐娜 是她逼我的

translation.en: Yeah. I guess we had a lot of crazy ideas back then.
translation.zh: 当年我们的确有不少不可思议的想法

translation.en: Hey, do you remember that promise we made?
translation.zh: 你还记得我们的约定吗？

translation.en: Sorry, I wasn't expecting my own giant face.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我没料到会看见自己的样子

translation.en: [chuckles] Don't be embarrassed. When I first saw that, I almost fell over.
translation.zh: 何必觉得丢脸？我第一次看到这个广告板时 也差点跌倒了

translation.en: But it's been nice. Kind of like you were back.
translation.zh: 但感觉挺好的 有点像你回来了

translation.en: But, you know, giant and glowing, and super glamorous.
translation.zh: 巨大闪亮 风采迷人

translation.en: Doesn't hold a candle to the real thing, though.
What do you say we go for a real date?
translation.zh: 不如我们来个真正的约会？

translation.en: No Dan or any of that.
translation.zh: 到时我不是阿丹也不去豪华餐厅什么

translation.en: Where have you been? The shoot starts in an hour!
translation.zh: 俐娜 你去哪里了？一个小时后要拍照

translation.en: What happened to your hair? I'm sending a car!
translation.zh: 你的头发怎么了？我马上派车去接你

translation.en: Din… I had a really wonderful time tonight,
translation.zh: 阿丁 我今晚过得很开心

translation.en: -Thanks for letting me borrow this. -Keep it till next time.
translation.zh: -感谢你借我外套-不要紧的 下次再还给我

translation.en: Not like I'm not gonna see you for another…
the truth is, I have this whole other life now.
translation.zh: 其实我已经拥有新的生活了

translation.en: A future that my dad worked really hard for.
translation.zh: 我爸爸为我的未来下了很多工夫

translation.en: Certain expectations I have to meet.
I… I'm just trying to be…
Did you know that shrimp chips
translation.zh: 你知道吗？ 虾饼其实并没有虾？

translation.en: don't actually have any shrimp in the ingredients?

translation.zh: 还是孩子的时候 一切都很简单

translation.en: You can finally be rid of me.
I'm ready for my third wish.
translation.zh: 我已经准备好要许第三个愿望了

translation.en: Make me rich. Piles of gold.
translation.zh: 把我变成个有钱人给我堆积如山的黄金

translation.en: Give me the gold, and I can have some of that good life.
translation.zh: 给我黄金吧这样我就能过着那种好日子了

translation.en: People will treat me with respect.
translation.zh: 人们也会对我放尊重点

translation.en: Heck, I'm sure everyone will want to be my friend then.
translation.zh: 天啊 我也相信到时每个人都想跟我做朋友

translation.en: Am I sure? You've been telling me to make this wish since we met.
translation.zh: 我确定吗？ 打从我们见面后你就一直叫我许下这个愿望

translation.en: Well, you were right. Okay? I was wrong.
translation.zh: 你说得对 好吗？我错了

translation.en: There you go, that's my wish.
translation.zh: 来吧 这就是我的愿望

translation.en: Just grant it, and you can go back to your spirit world
translation.zh: 只要实现我的愿望你就可以返回天界了

translation.en: and your stupid parade in the sky.
translation.zh: 到时天界会出动大队迎接你
龙兄 实现我这个愿望吧
阿丁 我会实现你的愿望

translation.en: But first, there's something I need to show you.
translation.zh: 但首先 我要让你看一件事

translation.en: You found the boy. Where is he?
translation.zh: 找到那个男孩了 他在哪里？

translation.en: -At the Pearl Tower, sir. -Yeah, with a girl.
translation.zh: -他刚才出现在珍珠塔-跟一个女孩在一起

translation.en: -But I'm afraid he escaped again. -What? How?
translation.zh: -但他已经逃走了-什么？怎么逃走的？

translation.en: Hey, that doesn't belong to you.
Listen to me. I am out of time. I need--
translation.zh: 听好 我已经没时间了 我需要…

translation.en: -Li Na! Aren't you supposed to be at-- -I'm sorry, Dad. We really need to talk.
translation.zh: -俐娜 你不是应该在…-抱歉 爸爸 我们需要好好聊聊

translation.en: -I'm just on a very important call. -Dad.
translation.zh: -我在讲一个很重要的电话-爸爸

translation.en: Do you remember when we lived in that old shikumen?
translation.zh: 你还记得我们住在那个旧石库门的日子吗？

translation.en: -I know we didn't have much but-- -Don't worry, Li Na.
translation.zh: -我知道当时我们有的不多 可是…-放心吧 俐娜

translation.en: We'll never go back to that life.
translation.zh: 我们再也不会回去过那种生活了

translation.en: But, Dad, don't you ever miss those days?
translation.zh: 可是爸爸 你没怀念过那些日子吗？

translation.en: Wha-- Where is all this coming from?
That… that young man last night,
the one you arranged a date with,
translation.zh: 那个你安排我约会的对象

translation.en: And he's the one who took you to the Pearl Tower.
translation.zh: 他就是带你去珍珠塔的那个人？

translation.en: Yes, and I know what you'll say.
translation.zh: 对啊 我知道你一定会说什么

translation.en: You'll tell me to stay away and to leave that old world behind,
translation.zh: 你会叫我远离他 放下过去的日子

translation.en: but the truth is, I think we might be happier if--
translation.zh: 其实 如果我们回到从前我们也许会比较快乐

translation.en: Li Na, everything's going to be all right. I'm gonna go talk with Din.
translation.zh: 一切都会好起来的 我去跟阿丁谈谈
-什么？-把客货车开过来 两分钟后见

translation.en: I learned from a young age that gold is power.
translation.zh: 从小就知道黄金 就是力量

translation.en: So, I set my sights on expanding my fortune
translation.zh: 于是我放眼追逐更多财富

translation.en: and let nothing stand in my way.
translation.zh: 不让任何人事物阻挠我
我的下人个个忠心耿耿
年复一年 不停地劳动

translation.en: My daughters were married to the finest families,
translation.zh: 我女儿都嫁给了皇亲国戚

translation.en: And my son, I sent off to win treasure.
translation.zh: 我的儿子 被我派去争夺财富

translation.en: Soon, I had more gold, more land,
translation.zh: 我的黄金越来越多 土地越来越大

translation.en: and more monuments than any lord who had come before me.
translation.zh: 我的纪念碑也比任何对我俯首称臣的君主还要多

translation.en: as I laid on my deathbed,
I awaited the parade of loyal subjects and loving family.
translation.zh: 我等着忠诚的奴仆和家人组成大队来到我身边

translation.en: With my last breath, I cursed all who had forgotten me.
translation.zh: 我用最后一口气诅咒所有遗忘我的人

translation.en: I arrived at the gates to the spirit world
and awaited a great procession to welcome me.
Instead, the gods transformed me into a Wish Dragon.
translation.zh: 于是神明把我变成了一条许愿神龙

translation.en: I was imprisoned and sent down to Earth
translation.zh: 我被囚禁在茶壶里 送往人间

translation.en: to serve ten masters and learn the true meaning of life.
translation.zh: 为是个主人效力直到领悟到人生的真谛为止

translation.en: I don't know the meaning of life. But the things you care about,
translation.zh: 我不知道人生的真谛是什么 但你在乎的一切

translation.en: are worth more than anything I ever possessed.
translation.zh: 比我所拥有过的一切还要珍贵

translation.en: And no amount of gold can ever buy that.
translation.zh: 那是多少黄金都买不到的
阿丁 这是你的愿望

translation.en: Make sure it's what you really want.
translation.zh: 你只要确定这是你真正想要的就可以了

translation.en: Mr. Wang? What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 王先生 你怎么来了？

translation.en: Please, give me that. I don't have time for any more games.
translation.zh: 请你把茶壶交出来我没时间跟你闹着玩了

translation.en: No one's going to get hurt, but I need those--
translation.zh: 不会有人受到伤害的 但我需要那些…

translation.en: What's wrong with you? I told you not to hurt the kid.
translation.zh: 你干什么？我跟你说过别伤害那个孩子的

translation.en: I've been bowing to others my entire life.
translation.zh: 我这辈子都对人卑躬屈膝

translation.en: And now, everyone will bow to me.
translation.zh: 从今以后 每个人都要对我俯首称臣

translation.en: -Mr. Wang. -[bald man] Dragon, I summon you.
And I know my first wish.
translation.zh: 我知道自己第一个愿望是什么

translation.en: No! Oh, my God. What happened to you?
translation.zh: 不要啊 天啊 你怎么了？

translation.en: Call an ambulance! You're gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 快叫救护车 你不会有事的 爸爸

translation.en: I tried to save it, but the business is bankrupt.
translation.zh: 我试过要拯救一切但是生意还是失败了

translation.en: I wanted you to have everything.
And now, I've left you with nothing.
translation.zh: 如今… 我什么都没能给你

translation.en: I never needed any of that.
translation.zh: 那些东西我从来都不需要

translation.en: All I ever wanted was my dad.
One touch and you're done, kid.
translation.zh: 我一碰到你 你就完蛋了

translation.en: Yeah, get him, boss. Touch him. Touch him good.
translation.zh: 是啊 老大 揍他 碰他 好好碰他

translation.en: Uh, dragon guy? I summon you.
I wish for enough puppies to open a pet store.
translation.zh: 我希望拥有很多小狗狗多到足以开一家宠物店

translation.en: Hey, little fella! I'll name you Teddy.
translation.zh: 嗨 小家伙 我就给你取名叫泰迪

translation.en: Hey, boss! I got the teapot!
translation.zh: 老大 茶壶在我手上

translation.en: Don't let the boy get it!
-Help us! Summon the dragon! -Wish for something! A gun, anything!
translation.zh: 帮帮我们 快召唤那条神龙 许个愿 要一把枪 什么都行

translation.en: I wish I had longer legs.
I command you to throw this kid off.
translation.zh: 神龙 我命令你把这个孩子甩下去

translation.en: I cannot intervene. You're not my master until you have sole possession.
translation.zh: 我不能插足 除非你完全拥有那个茶壶否则你不是我的主人

translation.en: Long, Long, I can't see you!
There's no need to die tonight, kid. Come work for me.
translation.zh: 孩子 你今晚大可不用死 来当我的手下吧

translation.en: I'll give you all the gold you want.
translation.zh: 要多少黄金 我都能给你

translation.en: -We're both wishing for the same thing. -No.
translation.zh: 毕竟我们的愿望是一样的 你搞错了

translation.en: I have something more important to wish for.
translation.zh: 我有比拥有黄金更重要的愿望

translation.en: Well, at least you'll make a good statue in my office.
translation.zh: 起码你可以成为我办公室里的一座漂亮雕像
怎么回事？ -这是什么地方？-恭喜你

translation.en: Your service as a Wish Dragon is complete.
translation.zh: 许愿神龙的任务已经完成了

translation.en: Complete? I haven't finished. I haven't finished my tenth master.
translation.zh: 完成？我还没完成啊 我第十个主人的愿望还没实现呢

translation.en: You have put the needs of another before yourself
translation.zh: 你把他人的需要摆在自己利益之前

translation.en: and shown us that you understand the meaning of life.
translation.zh: 说明你已经领悟到人生真谛了

translation.en: You are now free to enter the spirit world.
translation.zh: 如今你可以进入天界了

translation.en: No, I can't! I have to go back.
translation.zh: 不行 我必须回到人间！

translation.en: Turn me back into a Wish Dragon! I have one more wish to grant.
translation.zh: 把我变回许愿神龙我还要一个愿望还没实现

translation.en: Ridiculous. The laws of heaven forbid it.
translation.zh: 荒唐 天界没有这种规矩

translation.en: You're ridiculous! Old man in a skirt.
translation.zh: 你才荒唐你这个穿着短裙的老男人

translation.en: You dare reject the will of the gods?
translation.zh: 你竟敢拒绝神明的旨意？

translation.en: Fine. If you're not gonna send me back, I'll go myself!
translation.zh: 好吧 如果你不送我回去 我自己回去！

translation.en: We will permit you to return.
There you are, Maurice. Here we got Pocket and Mr. Pants.
translation.zh: 找到你了 大毛 还有小袋和裤裤
天啊 好可爱的狗狗

translation.en: When I said that you needed to be more realistic, I didn't mean that--
translation.zh: 我说你应该现实点 我的意思不是…

translation.en: I'm sorry I can't give you a better life.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我不给你更好的生活

translation.en: You've given me a lot, Mom.
translation.zh: 你已经给我很多了 妈妈

translation.en: it's late and, uh, we should have dinner.
translation.zh: 晚了 我们应该开饭了

translation.en: -What are you doing? -Is Din all right?
translation.zh: -你怎么来了？-阿丁在家吗？他没事吧？

translation.en: Din, what trouble have you started now?
translation.zh: 阿丁 你又闯了什么祸？

translation.en: No, no. No trouble at all.
Ah, well, where are my manners? Sit, sit, sit!
-We were about to have dinner. -You don't have to.

translation.zh: 哪会呢？ 这是我的荣幸

translation.en: And besides, we haven't had guests in, well, a couple hours!
translation.zh: 再说我们家有“一阵子”没客人来了

translation.en: They're much too young to be holding hands.
translation.zh: 他们还年轻 不适合牵手

translation.en: Here, you look like you could use a good, home-cooked meal.
translation.zh: 请慢用 你看起来需要吃一碗美味的家常菜

translation.en: This is the most delicious soup I've ever tasted.
translation.zh: 这是我尝过最美味的汤

translation.en: Na Na! Well, what do you think? It's too much, isn't it? I'll get another.
translation.zh: 娜娜 你觉得如何？太花俏了 对吧？我去弄另一个

translation.en: It's great, Dad. Put it up in the front window.
translation.zh: 很漂亮 爸爸 放在窗前
-对！明天前送到 否则免谈-嗨

translation.en: Okay, hurry up with those dumplings. You, step aside.
translation.zh: 好了 赶紧把饺子做好 闪边去

translation.en: Din! Hello? Where are the teacups?
-We open in ten minutes. -I'm on it.
Long, what are you doing? You're supposed to be in the spirit world.
translation.zh: 龙兄 你在这里干什么？你不是应该在天界吗？

translation.en: Yeah, uh, about that, uh, things got a little complicated.
translation.zh: 提起那件事 事情变得有点复杂

translation.en: Back? To serve another ten masters?
translation.zh: 回来？回来为多十个主人效力吗？

translation.en: But, you've been waiting 1,000 years just to get through those gates.
translation.zh: 可是你等了一千年才能踏进那扇门

translation.en: I know, there was a parade and everything, but… you had one more wish.
translation.zh: 可不是吗？确实有迎接大队什么 可是… 当时你还有一个愿望
重返人间是唯一的方法

translation.en: You gave all that up for me?
For the first time, it feels like I have a little wisdom to offer. Maybe make a difference down here.
translation.zh: 那是我第一次觉得能把智慧传授给人能给人间带来改变

translation.en: Besides, there are no shrimp chips there,
translation.zh: 再说 天界没有虾饼

translation.en: and I still haven't ridden in one of those metal birds,
translation.zh: 我也还坐做过大铁鸟呢

translation.en: and no air conditioning. No air conditioning in heaven!
translation.zh: 还有 天界没有空调！

translation.en: Din, why is there a pile of broken teacups in the--
translation.zh: 阿丁 为什么袋子里有一堆破掉的茶杯？

translation.en: Know what? I don't want to know.
What are you looking at? A god, that's what.
translation.zh: 看什么看？我是神仙 你眼前的人是神仙
